nodes.text: A female individual was the mother of Qymaen jai Sheelal, a Kaleesh male from the species' homeworld Kalee. Sheelal, who later became known as Grievous, went on to be a warlord. He chose to undergo drastic cybernetic upgrades over a period of time before being fully reconstructed after a nearly-fatal shuttle crash. Although his mother and father were flesh-and-blood individuals, Grievous's cybernetics replaced most of his original Kaleesh form.
Grievous's mother was mentioned, albeit indirectly, in Star Wars Made Easy, a 2017 reference book written by Christian Blauvelt.
